title: HOUR 2- Sep 30, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Sep 30, 2020
description:
Dan talks about the options the NFL faces with the postponement of the Titans & Steelers football game. Dan talks about the Las Vegas Raiders not having on mask at a player sponsored event.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
